description: Try our easy to follow Thai-Style Prawns recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ prawn,Pescatarian,Prawn,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,BBQ,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Thai-Style Prawns Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grate rind of 1 large lime and juice. Combine with 1/2 cup olive oil, 1 chopped green shallot, 1 chopped long red chilli, 1 tablespoon fish sauce, 2 teaspoon dried coriander, 2 crushed garlic cloves and 1/2 bunch fresh coriander, finely chopped in a large bowl.
Add 1kg Large Green Banana or Australian King Prawns.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
Preheat a BBQ hot plate over high heat. Grease with 1 tablespoon of olive oil. Add prawns and cook for 5 minutes or until crisp and cooked through. Transfer to a platter.
Top with coriander and lime wedges.
